title: 4ACEs App
select_picture_instruction: Select the picture that best matches the sentence you heard.
apple_sentences: Apples are a type of fruit.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
bike_sentences: Riding a bike is good exercise.
car_sentences: A car can take you to many places.
cat_sentences: A cat is a small domesticated carnivorous mammal.
The cat is sleeping on the mat.
dog_sentences: A dog is a man's best friend.
motorcycle_sentences: A motorcycle is a two-wheeled motor vehicle.
He rides his motorcycle to work.
tree_sentences: A tree has a trunk, branches, and leaves.
The birds are singing in the tree.
